title: Beware Netflix Users, This Scam Can Steal Your Credit Card Details
content: Cybersecurity experts have alerted Netflix users against an SMS phishing campaign being used to steal account and credit card information.
summary: Cybersecurity experts have alerted Netflix users against an SMS phishing campaign being used to steal account and credit card information.

title: Indian-Origin Man Wins Rs 8.45 Crore Lottery After Buying Jewellery For Wife
content: The Singapore High Commission in India posted a congratulatory message for Balasubramanian Chithambaram after he won the lottery.

title: US Defence Pick's Mother Accuses Him Of Decades-Long Mistreatment Of Women

title: China Jails Journalist Who Met With Japanese Diplomats For Alleged Espionage
content: A Beijing court on Friday sentenced veteran Chinese state media journalist Dong Yuyu to seven years in prison on espionage charges, his family said.
summary: A Beijing court on Friday sentenced veteran Chinese state media journalist Dong Yuyu to seven years in prison on espionage charges, his family said.

title: Nigeria: At Least 27 Dead After Boat Capsizes In Niger River
content: A Nigerian river ferry capsized Friday killing at least 27 people and leaving many missing, officials told AFP of the latest in a series of mass drownings on the country's busy waterways.
summary: A Nigerian river ferry capsized Friday killing at least 27 people and leaving many missing, officials told AFP of the latest in a series of mass drownings on the country's busy waterways.

title: Explained: What's Happening in Syria, How It Could Affect Middle East
content: The civil war in Syria had thawed. But 13 years since the beginning of one of the worst humanitarian crises of the 21st century, a new surge in violence has reignited attention on a conflict that had faded from the world's headlines.
summary: The civil war in Syria had thawed. But 13 years since the beginning of one of the worst humanitarian crises of the 21st century, a new surge in violence has reignited attention on a conflict that had faded from the world's headlines.

title: US Approves $320 Billion F-16 Fighter Planes, Radar Systems To Taiwan
content: The United States on Friday said it had approved the possible sale of spare parts for F-16 fighter planes and radar systems to Taiwan, in a deal valued at $320 million.
summary: The United States on Friday said it had approved the possible sale of spare parts for F-16 fighter planes and radar systems to Taiwan, in a deal valued at $320 million.

title: US Model, Kidnapped By Armed Men In Brazil, Released After 12 Hours

title: Sydney Woman Kills Husband With Drop Saw, Disposes Of Body In 30 Bags

title: Cash-Strapped Sri Lanka Records Highest Deflation In 61 Years
content: Sri Lanka's consumer prices fell by 2.1 percent in November, the highest deflation rate recorded by the economically fragile island nation since 1961, official data showed Saturday.
summary: Sri Lanka's consumer prices fell by 2.1 percent in November, the highest deflation rate recorded by the economically fragile island nation since 1961, official data showed Saturday.

title: After Hindu Leader's Arrest, 17 ISKCON Bank Accounts Frozen In Bangladesh
content: Bangladesh's authorities have ordered freezing for 30 days the bank accounts of 17 people associated with ISKCON, including its former member Chinmoy Krishna Das arrested this week on sedition charges, media reports said Friday.
summary: Bangladesh's authorities have ordered freezing for 30 days the bank accounts of 17 people associated with ISKCON, including its former member Chinmoy Krishna Das arrested this week on sedition charges, media reports said Friday.

title: UK Woman Fined For Littering In Village She Hadn't Visited For Decades
